display_long_description:
Project AEROES offers a **unique new gameplay mechanic** that is **only possible in Mixed Reality**, and will **get you moving** around your whole room.

Draw paths to land ships and earn credits. Stop crashes and avoid dangers to progress to the next wave. Each wave is harder than the last—how long can you survive?  
    
**What people say about Project AEROES:**  
"This game is something special for MR"  
"...makes me sweat more than Beat Saber"  
"Leaderboards, unlocks and a banging soundtrack keep me coming back again for “just one more go!”"  

[media]

# Features
- Avoid dangers like meteor showers, floating islands, & neutrino blasts
- Use abilities to help you like Portal Hammer, Timeslow, and Speed Up
- Credits can be earned during a run and used to upgrade your ships
- Custom soundtrack that intensifies as you progress through the game  

[media]

- As well as the main game, try "Challenge” mode where you can test yourself against 10 unique situations and earn grades for your performances
- 20 rare, mysterious AEROE ships to collect - can you discover them all?
- Check your world ranking and compete against friends with global leader boards

Project AEROES offers cosmetic in-game [paid] DLCs where you can unlock five new ship factions, each with their own customized soundtrack.

Project AEROES is developed by SUPER HYPER MEGA, a multi award-winning studio. Join the Discord -> https://discord.gg/q5RsxhW9wR
